hero.heading: Car Leasing – The Right Solution for You
texts: Innolease offers comprehensive and flexible leasing solutions for both individuals and businesses. We want to make driving as easy and worry-free as possible – choose the option that best suits your needs, and we'll take care of the rest.

calculator.heading: Leasing Calculator
texts: Calculate your own leasing payment and see how affordable leasing can be.

fields.disclaimer: This is an estimate. Actual costs may vary. Taxation is assumed to be paid from net earnings on the monthly payment.

cards.title: For Individuals – Simplicity for Everyday Life
texts: Personal leasing is a hassle-free way to get a new car without a large down payment. The fixed monthly price covers almost all costs – maintenance, insurance, and tires – so you can focus on driving. At the end of the contract period, you can return the car, switch to a new one, or continue the contract.

cards.title: For Businesses – Efficiency and Flexibility for Business
texts: Business leasing helps manage your company's vehicle fleet efficiently and cost-effectively. We offer customized contracts, a wide selection of vehicles, and a dedicated contact person who assists with all driving-related matters. Mini leasing is the perfect solution for short-term needs – you can get a car for use even the next day without long-term commitment.

cards.title: Leasing Terms – Flexible and Transparent
texts: Our leasing contracts are clear and flexible. You can choose the contract duration (1–60 months), mileage, and additional services according to your needs. The fixed monthly price makes budgeting easier, and there are no hidden costs. Feel free to ask for more – we'll tailor a solution just for you.

cards.title: Vehicle Selection – Find the Right Car
texts: We offer a wide selection of cars: from small passenger cars to spacious family cars, vans, and electric vehicles. All our cars are well-equipped and regularly maintained. You can also test different car types before making a longer commitment.

benefits.heading: Why Choose Leasing?
list: No large down payment – you only pay for usage
Fixed monthly price makes financial planning easier
Maintenance, insurance, and tires are included in the contract
No resale worries – return the car at the end of the contract period
Fast delivery – car available even the next day
Possibility to change cars as needed

examples.heading: Practical Examples
list: Need a car for a project? Mini leasing is a flexible solution for short-term needs.
Is your business growing rapidly? Leasing enables fleet expansion without large investments.
Want to test an electric car before making a purchase decision? With leasing, you can try different models risk-free.

questions.question: Can I change cars during the contract period?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible options to change cars when your life situation changes.

questions.question: Are insurance and maintenance included in the monthly price?
questions.answer: Yes, in most contracts, insurance and maintenance are included in the fixed monthly price.

questions.question: How do I return the car at the end of the contract period?
questions.answer: You can return the car to an agreed location. You'll get detailed instructions from our customer service.

cta.heading: Interested in Leasing?
